## highchartOutput
Widget output function for use in Shiny

#### Description 

Widget output function for use in Shiny

#### Usage
<pre><code>
highchartOutput(outputId, width = "100%", height = "400px")
highchartOutput2(outputId, width = "100%", height = "400px")
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* outputId The name of the input.
* width A numeric input in pixels.
* height A numeric input in pixels.
